articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Ground Jet Test of New-type High-Power Engine of Inter-continental Ballistic Rocket
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Ground Jet Test of New-type High-Power Engine of Inter-continental Ballistic Rocket
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The DPRK succeeded in the ground jet test of a new type high-power engine of inter-continental ballistic rocket designed and produced by the scientists and technicians in its field of national defence. 
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, issued an order to conduct the ground jet test of a new type high-power engine of inter-continental ballistic rocket and personally came to the Sohae Space Center to guide the test.
					
					 He gave an order to start the test.
					
					 The moment the engine spewed out huge flames with deafening boom.
					
					 The results of the test proved that the high-power engine, designed and manufactured by the scientists and technicians in the field of national defence with their own efforts and technology in the Korean style, satisfied all scientific and technological indexes.
					
					 He was greatly pleased with the results of the test and highly praised the scientists and technicians for having brought about another epochal event in demonstrating the dignity and the inexhaustible power of the great Paektusan nation by putting into practice the intention and will of the party to adorn the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea as a golden age in bolstering up the Juche-oriented national defence.
					
					 The great success made in the test provided a firm guarantee for mounting another form of nuclear attack upon the U.S. imperialists and other hostile forces and made it possible to have access to more powerful means capable of reacting to nukes in kind, he noted, adding: This is an eye-catching event which demonstrated our national defence capability before the world and another great victory achieved by our people in the drive for glorifying the Seventh Congress of the WPK with unprecedented successes.
					
					 Now the DPRK can tip new type inter-continental ballistic rockets with more powerful nuclear warheads and keep any cesspool of evils in the earth including the U.S. mainland within our striking range and reduce them to ashes so that they may not survive in our planet, he said, stressing the need to diversify nuclear attack means at a higher level to cope with the ever-more increasing nuclear threats and arbitrariness of the U.S. imperialists and thus decisively counter nukes in kind. 
					
					 He expressed great expectation and belief that scientists and technicians in the field of national defence would give full rein to their inexhaustible creative efforts true to the party's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts and its plan for building the nuclear force and thereby bring about manifold changes in the development and production  of Juche-oriented weapons and bombs capable of firmly guaranteeing the ever-lasting future of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea and remarkably reinforce the nuclear arsenal of the Supreme Command. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Ri Man Gon, department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Jo Yong Won, Hong Yong Chil and Kim Jong Sik, vice department directors of the C.C., the WPK, and General Kim Rak Gyom, commander of the Strategic Force of the KPA.

articles.title: Greetings to Vietnamese PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Vietnamese PM
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Pak Pong Ju Friday sent a message of greeting to Nguyen Xuan Phuc upon his election as prime minister of Vietnam.
					 Expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries will continue to favorably develop in all fields, the message wished the prime minister bigger successes in his responsible work and good health.

articles.title: Foreign Artistes Here
articles.content:
Foreign Artistes Here
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The Malaysia Fresco Harmonica Ensemble and a soloist and her companion of the Japan-Korea Society for Music and Art Interchange arrived here Saturday to take part in the 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of officials of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan headed by Chairman Kim Jong Su visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Saturday.
					 They laid bouquets before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Service personnel, working people and school youth and children paid tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and portraits of the smiling great leaders across the country on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK. 
					 Seen standing before the statues on Mansu Hill was a floral basket sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the names of the party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, and institutions, industrial establishments, farms and schools here, and bouquets and flowers. 
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to the statutes. 
					
					 Floral baskets, bouquets and flowers were laid before the statues of the great leaders and the portraits of the smiling leaders in various places of the city including Kim Il Sung University, Kim Il Sung Military University, Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, Ministry of People's Security and the Mansudae Art Studio in the names of units of the KPA, institutions and enterprises.
					
					 Servicepersons, officials, working people and school youth and children across the country visited the statues of the great leaders and the portraits of the smiling leaders in their residential areas.

articles.title: Journalists Union Slams S. Korean Regime's Smear Campaign against DPRK
articles.content:
Journalists Union Slams S. Korean Regime's Smear Campaign against DPRK
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Nowadays south Korean conservative media are hell-bent on a smear campaign against the DPRK.
					 They are spouting rubbish that the "resolution on sanctions against the north" adopted by the U.S.-led forces at the UN Security Council made it difficult for the DPRK to carry out its plans of the 70-day campaign and its trouble is snowballing due to the lack of finance.
					
					 Hack writers paid by the south Korean puppet regime, who are utterly ignorant of the life of the people in the DPRK as they had never been to it, are busy floating a false story about "forbidden ceremonies for marriage, funeral and ancestral worship" and "attempts to defect from the north."
					
					 A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Journalists Union of Korea in a statement Saturday terms this an intolerable insult to the dignity and social system of the DPRK and the worthwhile life and aspiration of its people and an unpardonable hideous provocation.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 The 70-day campaign being staged by all service personnel and people of the DPRK is an all-people general offensive to foil the unheard-of challenges of all hostile forces and bring about the final victory in the building of a socialist thriving nation through self-reliance and self-development by getting single-mindedly united around the leader.
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime will never understand the noble spirit of the people of the DPRK and the feats performed by them every day as it can never exist without outsiders' help.
					
					 The puppet regime claims that the Korean people are conducting the 70-day campaign, believing in someone. This is no more than sheer sophism that can be spouted only by the Park Geun Hye regime and its hack writers as they are staking their fate on the U.S.
					
					 The reality shows that disaster is inevitable if the disgusting hack writers and servants of the puppet regime are allowed to go reckless to stoke confrontation with the compatriots in the north, bereft of justice and truth, impartiality and objectivity, the vital ethics of media.
					
					 The puppet regime-patronized conservative media would be well advised to be cautious about their tongue-lashing if they don't want to face a merciless punishment by the DPRK.
					
					 No matter what rhetoric the riff-raffs forsaken by the nation and the times reel off, they can never hold in check the dynamic advance of the DPRK led by the great Party and the world will clearly witness a signal success of its 70-day campaign of loyalty.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place Saturday across the country on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK. 
					 Dancing parties began with song "The Fortune of Korea" at the venues of dancing parties in Pyongyang including the plazas of the Arch of Triumph and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium.
					
					 They danced recollecting the feats Kim Jong Il performed by training the young people as staunch fighters to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Such songs as "Youth and Courage" and "Dash toward Future" were played to rev up the atmosphere.
					
					 Dancing parties were also held at provincial seats, cities and counties that day.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Environmental Protection
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Environmental Protection
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has paid big efforts to environmental protection.
					 In recent years, efficient apparatuses were installed at environmental observation posts throughout the country to take automatic and real-time measurement of sulfurous acid gas in the air and display, record and transmit those measurements.
					
					 A number of sci-tech problems were settled, among them the technique of collecting gas and dust at industrial furnaces and boilers, additive for decreasing exhaust fumes from automobiles, technology and materials for purifying industrial waste water and the recycling of waste materials.
					
					 Meanwhile, settling ponds have been reconstructed or repaired and industrial waste water treatment plants cleaned out in different parts of the country to prevent river and marine pollution.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un made public famous work "On Bringing about a Revolutionary Turn in Land Administration in Line with the Demands for Building a Thriving Socialist Country" that serves as a guideline for environmental protection.
					
					 Law on Environmental Protection was adopted in the DPRK on April 9, Juche 75 (1986).

articles.title: Pigo, World's First Glider Invented by Korean Nation
articles.content:
Pigo, World's First Glider Invented by Korean Nation
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Among the Korean nation's cultural heritages is Pigo (flying vehicle) which can be claimed to be the world's first glider.
					 The glider was invented for military communications in the early days of the Imjin Patriotic War (1592-1598) by Yun Tal Gyu, a resident in Jonju area of southern Korea.
					
					 According to a history book written by Ri Kyu Gyong, a realist scholar in the mid-19th century, this flying vehicle was used to carry a communications man 12 kilometers in October 1592 when Jinju Castle in Kyongsang Province of the country was surrounded by the Japanese invaders.
					
					 The eagle-shaped glider consisted of wings, four seats, blower, air bag, control rope, wheels. It was written that this glider could fly 300 meters from a high peak or castle with help of wind and wings' operation.

articles.title: Achievements in Railway Transport of DPRK
articles.content:
Achievements in Railway Transport of DPRK
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Railway workers in the DPRK have registered big achievements in freight and production of electric locomotives.
					 According to Jang Chol Su, an office head at the Ministry of Railways, the ministry's transport plan for March was over-fulfilled and tens of thousands more tons of freight than schedule were carried away in the first six days of April.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex made innovations in the production of locomotives and the Pyongyang Passenger and Freight Car Corps finished the painting of trains in only 40-odd days after the start of the ongoing 70-day campaign.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Blamed for Kicking up Racket for Eliminating "Forces Following North"
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Blamed for Kicking up Racket for Eliminating "Forces Following North"
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Crimes committed by the Park Geun Hye group of traitors have touched off towering indignation of all the Koreans as it kicked up the whirlwind of confrontation in south Korea through the racket for eliminating the "forces following the north" and pushed the north-south relations to a stalemate while working as a shock brigade in realizing the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					 Traitor Park Geun Hye, being seized by extreme bitterness toward her fellow countrymen, cooked up the absurd "theory of eliminating the forces following the north" and used it as a means for enforcing dictatorial rule and executing the policy of confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 She designated the DPRK as an "anti-state organization" and "enemy" and retrogressively revised the "National Security Law" which she has used as a main means for violence in her bid to stamp out progress and democracy in south Korea.
					
					 The criminal nature of the racket for eliminating the "forces following the north" which the group of traitors has escalated is being brought to light as the racket has been linked with the moves for provocation of a war against the DPRK and the attempt at "collapse of its social system".
					
					 Due to the racket for eliminating the "forces following the north" kicked up by traitor Park Geun Hye, south Korea has turned into a theatre of confrontation with the fellow countrymen and the north-south ties plunged into a deadlock and the puppet army is being held at the threshold of a nuclear war as a cannon fodder of the U.S. imperialists and confrontational maniacs.
					
					 Just as a rabid dog has to be beaten to death, the root cause of misfortune can be removed only when wench Park Geun Hye running headlong to escalate confrontation with the fellow countrymen, being unaware of where she stands, is eliminated.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Nuclear War Maneuvers No Longer Tolerable: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Nuclear War Maneuvers No Longer Tolerable: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Key Resolve joint military exercise, combined command drill staged with all U.S. nuclear weapons and special operation forces involved came to an end in south Korea but mobile Foal Eagle 16 is still going on. 
					 The U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces are openly committing this saber-rattling with main emphasis on carrying out their hideous criminal scenario targeting the headquarters of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is the most blatant challenge to the great and sacred dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and an open declaration of a war against it.
					
					 The irrepressible resentment of the Korean army and people at the U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors and their resolution to take revenge upon them are running high. 
					
					 The U.S. has completely lost a monopoly of the right to preemptive nuclear strike on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Now the U.S. mainland is not free from the deadly strike of the armed forces of the DPRK.
					
					 All our service personnel and people can no longer pardon the madcap nuclear war maneuvers of the U.S. imperialists, the sworn enemy of the Korean people, and the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 They should not ignore the DPRK's repeated warnings.
					
					 If they wish to survive on this earth, they should roll back their nuclear confrontation policy at once.

articles.title: Minju Joson Discloses Intention behind U.S. Talk about "Provocation" and "Threat" from DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Discloses Intention behind U.S. Talk about "Provocation" and "Threat" from DPRK
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Obama and other riff-raffs of the White House are vying with each other in describing the DPRK's just countermeasures for self-defence as a "provocation" and "threat" in a bid to galvanize the public opinion.
					 Minju Joson Saturday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a trite method of the U.S. to cover up its true colors as aggressor and provocateur as well as sheer sophism of those who were driven into the tight corner after being browbeaten by the DPRK's toughest counteraction.
					
					 The fair public of the world is unanimous in asserting that the U.S. is bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S., finding itself in a predicament in the face of the strong condemnation by the international community, is working hard to shift the blame for the tension on the Korean peninsula on to the DPRK and get out of the tight corner at any cost by loudly vociferating about the "provocation" and threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 However, the U.S. trumpeting about "provocation" and "threat" is just a far cry and can never help it conceal its true colors as aggressor.
					
					 The U.S. is terming the DPRK a "provocateur" but this is not a way out.
					
					 What is left to be done by the U.S. now is just to recollect with cool mind the whole historical course of its anti-DPRK confrontation in which it suffered only defeats, and to drop its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 For the U.S. to escalate military confrontation with the DPRK, dignified military power of Juche and invincible nuclear weapons state possessed of even H-bomb, is little short of a suicidal act of pulling the U.S. into the bottomless abyss of destruction.

articles.title: S. Korean People Called upon to Get Towering Grudge of Ferry Sewol Victims Settled
articles.content:
S. Korean People Called upon to Get Towering Grudge of Ferry Sewol Victims Settled
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and the Korean Children's Union organizations issued a joint statement Saturday nearly two years since the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 The statement said that the ferry Sewol disaster was the worst tragedy that can occur only in the corrupt south Korean society and a high treason that can be committed only by the cruel Park Geun Hye group.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The ferry Sewol disaster was a clear reflection of the true picture of the south Korean society and, at the same time, an omen of a miserable future under the Park Geun Hye rule.
					
					 The present situation in south Korea is reminiscent of the huge ferry Sewol that sank to the bottom of the sea and its captain is none other than cruel, dirty and incompetent Park Geun Hye.
					
					 The south Korean youths and students have to clearly see through the miserable reality and turn out in the action to carve out genuine future.
					
					 The angry shouts of the departed souls of the ferry Sewol urge revenge on ogre Park Geun Hye.
					
					 Time has come for youths and students to take to the streets for actions to take revenge for those who met grievous deaths and not to face such miserable fate as them.
					
					 A number of parents of students in the south who are being deprived of all the beloved things of their lives in return for voting for murderer Park Geun Hye, please resolutely punish the Park Geun Hye group of murderers, root cause of evils, if they wish to punish the killers of their children and want to see their souls come back and if they do no longer want to see their children meeting miserable deaths.
					
					 Park Geun Hye should clearly understand that she will have to pay dearly for the monstrous crimes she committed by throwing innocent children into the abyss of misfortune and disaster and turning the whole land of the south land into a barren land and a veritable hell, and that even after her death her dirty name and body will be cursed generation after generation.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Call for Punishing Park Geun Hye Regime and "Saenuri Party" in April 13 Election
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Call for Punishing Park Geun Hye Regime and "Saenuri Party" in April 13 Election
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The Family Movement for Realizing Democracy  and other civic and public organizations in south Korea held a Thursday rally in Seoul on April 7 to call for punishing the Park Geun Hye regime and the "Saenuri Party" in the April 13 election.
					 The honorary chairman of the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy stressed the need to punish the Park Geun Hye regime and the "Saenuri Party" in the upcoming election to achieve freedom, democracy, independence, reunification and people's livelihood.
					
					 The secretary general of the People's Action for Democracy said the people should never forget the ferry Sewol sinking case, "agreement" on sexual slavery issue and "state-compiled history textbooks" in the election.
					
					 A co-representative of the Korea Solidarity said the south-north relations and democracy cannot be recovered and south Koreans from all walks of life will lead a hopeless life as long as the Park Geun Hye regime and the "Saenuri Party" are allowed to remain, calling for certainly punishing the group of traitors in the election.

articles.title: Newspapers Praise Kim Jong Il for Achieving Prosperity of Country and Nation
articles.content:
Newspapers Praise Kim Jong Il for Achieving Prosperity of Country and Nation
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- DPRK's newspapers Saturday carry editorials praising leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of his election as chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the benefactor of the nation and the peerless patriot who laid a firm foundation for the eternal prosperity of the country and people with his indefatigable Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, who always looked far into the future in leading the revolution and construction, unfolded a grand blueprint for building a prosperous country in the 1990s and energetically conducted ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 A socialist thriving nation planned by him was the one with strong power where everything prospers and people live with nothing more to desire in the world.
					
					 Songun politics and Songun revolutionary line of the Workers' Party of Korea is a reflection of his brilliant wisdom, and the state machinery with as a pivot of national defense was also a product of his rare foresight.
					
					 It was his steadfast will to make it sure that the single-minded unity, self-defensive capabilities, self-supporting national economy and cultural assets handed down by President Kim Il Sung are glorified for all ages as the cornerstone of building a thriving nation.
					
					 To him, patriotism just meant the warmest love and self-sacrificing devotion to the country and the people.
					
					 The greatest feat he performed for the eternal prosperity of the DPRK was that he perfectly solved the issue of succession to the leadership based on the principle of Songun.
					
					 Minju Joson praises him as the peerlessly great man who formulated the original Songun political mode for the first time in history, reliably defended the DPRK's dignity and sovereignty under the banner of Songun and laid a firm foundation for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Pressing Brigandish Demand
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Pressing Brigandish Demand
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Jong Uk Sik, representative of the Peace Network, a civic organization of south Korea, contributed an article to a newspaper on April 6, condemning the puppet regime for clamping down on inhabitants in Kangjong village, Sogwipho City, Jeju Province.
					 He said in an article that the south Korean authorities submitted a compensation bill of 3.45 billion won to the inhabitants in the village, peace activists and civic organizations that turned out in the action against the construction of the Jeju naval base.
					
					 He recalled that the navy on March 28 brought a compensation suit against those opposed to the Jeju naval base project following its postponement.
					
					 He accused the "government" of hurting and threatening people even though it is obliged to protect their lives and properties.

articles.title: Corruption Rampant in S. Korean Military
articles.content:
Corruption Rampant in S. Korean Military
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- It was reported that senior officers of the south Korean puppet navy and ground force were sentenced to jail terms recently, according to the south Korean MBC.
					 They forged a document on the normal performance of airplane starting generators produced by a company despite their defects in performance in November 2013 when they were working at the puppet Defence Affairs Agency.
					
					 They were detained in Dec. last year on charge of receiving briberies worth millions of won in return for helping sign a contract for the purchase of at least 90 generators. 
					
					 Agents of the Defense Security Command of the puppet army sold off secrets to big businessmen, and employees of foreign intelligence bodies.

articles.title: U.S. Is to Blame for Tension on Korean Peninsula: Russian Body
articles.content:
U.S. Is to Blame for Tension on Korean Peninsula: Russian Body
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK released a statement on April 1 condemning the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces for their war provocations against the DPRK.
					 Noting the U.S. attempts to shift the blame for the escalating tension on the Korean peninsula onto the DPRK, the statement said:
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that the dangerous situation on the Korean peninsula has been caused by the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. has turned south Korean into the biggest nuclear arsenal in the Far East and posed a nuclear threat to the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK was compelled to develop nuclear weapons as a means of self-defence.
					
					 No country and government in the world will tolerate such a hysterical challenge as running amuck to eliminate the leadership of a sovereign state through special operations.
					
					 If such military exercises are staged near the border of Russia, it will also react like the DPRK.
					
					 It is the lesson taught by history and the present stark reality that humiliating restraint or concession inevitably lead to ruin and turmoil.
					
					 The editorial board of the Russian newspaper Leninski Puchi in an e-mail to the DPRK embassy in Moscow expressed full support and solidarity with the army and people of the DPRK resolutely countering the U.S. imperialists' and the south Korean puppet forces' mad-cap moves of aggression.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed Abroad
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Russia, Sweden and Sri Lanka on Mar. 30 and Apr. 1 to observe the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 On display at the venues of the seminars were photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos showing the struggle of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Sazhi Umalatova, chairperson of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, and other reporters and speakers praised Kim Il Sung as an outstanding thinker and theoretician, iron-willed brilliant commander and tender-hearted father of the people who founded the immortal Juche idea, defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists in one generation and built a socialist power centered on the popular masses.
					
					 Oskar Molleby, chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that the exploits performed by Kim Il Sung for the cause of global independence, are really great.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at a seminar held in Sweden.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Swiss Organizations
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The exploits of Chairman of National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK Kim Jong Il for the country and people will shine forever.
					 The Swiss Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting for Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in their joint statement on April 3 on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the NDC of the DPRK.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 Chairman of the NDC Kim Jong Il applied the Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung to the revolution and construction and formulated Songun politics as the main political mode of socialist Korea.
					
					 He turned the DPRK into a satellite manufacturing and launching state and nuclear weapons state.
					
					 Thanks to his noble idea of national reunification, two summits were held between the north and the south and the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration adopted.
					
					 The Korean people are holding him in high esteem as the eternal chairman of the NDC of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by British Organization in Bulletin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by British Organization in Bulletin
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was carried by the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in its special bulletin "Star of Independence" on March 19 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The work published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012) deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il all their lives.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for firmly defending the idea and exploits of the President and Kim Jong Il and adding shine to them forever.
					
					 It carried a portrait of the smiling President.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Bulgaria
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" was published in pamphlet by a Bulgarian publishing house on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, and the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The work, published on October 10, Juche 104 (2015), says that the history of the WPK is a proud course in which it has taken responsible care of the people and led the Korean revolution to victory under the guidance of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige prueba en terreno de expulsion de motor para cohete balistico intercontinental de nuevo tipo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige prueba en terreno de expulsion de motor para cohete balistico intercontinental de nuevo tipo
Pyongyang, 9 de abril (ACNC) -- Los cientificos y tecnicos de la rama de defensa nacional investigaron y fabricaron el motor de gran capacidad para cohete balistico intercontinental de nuevo tipo y lograron exitos plenos en su prueba.
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dio la orden de ejecutar la prueba en el terreno de la expulsion del motor de gran capacidad para cohete balistico intercontinental de nuevo tipo y fue en personal al Campo de Lanzamiento de Satelites Sohae para dirigir su proceso.
					
					El Mariscal dio la orden de realizar la prueba.
					
					El resultado de la prueba ha comprobado que el motor disenado y elaborado a estilo coreano por los cientificos y tecnicos de la rama de defensa nacional apoyandose en sus propias fuerzas y tecnicas satisfizo todos los indices cientifico-tecnicos.
					
					Expresando gran satisfaccion sobre el resultado, el Mariscal evaluo altamente a los cientificos y tecnicos de la rama de defensa nacional quienes trajeron otro evento en ostentar la dignidad y el inagotable poderio estatal de la potencia Paektusan apoyando con practicas el proyecto y la decision del partido de glorificar el VII Congreso del PTC como era de  prosperidad plena del fortalecimiento de autoctona capacidad de defensa nacional.
					
					Subrayo que el gran exito de la presente prueba hizo preparar la firme garantia para asestar el ataque nuclear de otra forma al imperio yanqui y las fuerzas hostiles, y nos hizo dotar de otros medios mas poderosos con que podemos responder a las armas nucleares con las armas nucleares. Puntualizo que el hecho deviene un acontecimiento trascendental que demostro a todo el mundo el poderio de defensa nacional del pais y otra gran victoria lograda por el pueblo coreano en la lucha por acoger el VII Congreso del PTC con los resultados sin precedentes.
					
					Recalco que ya podemos instalar las ojivas nucleares mas fuertes en el cohete balistico intercontinental de nuevo tipo y convertir en cenizas los nidos de maldades que se encuentren por doquier de este mundo terraqueo inclusive el territorio principal norteamericano para que no se rehabiliten mas.
					
					Enfatizo que debemos responder con las armas nucleares a los artefactos nucleares al realizar en el nivel mas elevado la diversificacion de los medios de ataque nuclear frente a la creciente amenaza nuclear y arbitrariedad del imperio yanqui.
					
					Manifesto su gran esperanza y conviccion de que los cientificos y tecnicos de la rama de defensa nacional fortaleceran mas firmemente el arsenal nuclear de la Comandancia Suprema al registrar los eventos sucesivos en el desarrollo y produccion de armas y proyectiles autoctonos que garantizaran el eterno porvenir de la nacion de Kim Il Sung y Corea de Kim Jong Il descargando su inagotable fuerza creativa en acato a la linea de desarrollo paralelo del partido y su proyecto de construccion de armas nucleares.
					
					El Mariscal fue acompanado por Ri Man Gon, jefe de departamento del Comite Central del PTC, Jo Yong Won, Hong Yong Chil y Kim Jong Sik, subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, y el general de ejercito Kim Rak Gyom, comandante de las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC.

articles.title: Se registran sucesivos exitos en rama de transporte ferroviario
articles.content:
Se registran sucesivos exitos en rama de transporte ferroviario
Pyongyang, 9 de abril (ACNC) -- Los maquinistas y otros obreros de la rama de transporte ferroviario registran sucesivos exitos en el transporte ferroviario.
					Segun Jang Chol Su, jefe de seccion del Ministerio del Ferrocarril, en los dias 26, 27 y 28 de marzo se cumplio en 149%, 159% y 162%, respectivamente, el plan de transporte en escala ministerial. Transportaron mas de 10 mil toneladas mas que la cantidad transportada en el mismo periodo del 84 (1995) de la Era Juche.
					
					Con el impetu de haber sobrecumplido el plan de marzo, los trabajadores de esa rama transportaron decenas de miles de toneladas de carbon para la produccion electrica y de abonos y los materiales de construccion en los primeros 6 dias del mes en curso.
					
					El Complejo de Locomotoras Electricas Kim Jong Thae logra innovaciones en la produccion de locomotoras. El resultado laboral en produccion del motor de traccion y del auxiliar y la elaboracion de rueda y otros accesorios se incremento notablemente en comparacion con el mismo periodo del ano pasado.
					
					Al cabo de 40 dias y pico desde el inicio de la campana de 70 dias, la brigada de tren de pasajeros de Pyongyang completo la pintura de vagones segun lineas y empleo.

articles.title: Minju Joson revela intencion malsana de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Minju Joson revela intencion malsana de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 9 de abril (ACNC) -- Obama y la chusma de la Casa Blanca hacen esfuerzos desesperados por desviar mal la opinion publica describiendo como supuesta "provocacion" y "amenaza" las justas contramedidas de autodefensa recien tomadas por la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Esto es el metodo predilecto de Estados Unidos para encubrir la naturaleza de agresor y provocador y la sofisteria ridicula de los enajenados ante el enfrentamiento intransigente de la RPDC.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este sabado y prosigue:
					
					Ahora la justa opinion publica del mundo insiste unanimemente en que EE.UU. es precisamente el acarreador principal del nubarron de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					EE.UU. en aprieto ante la fuerte condenacion de la sociedad internacional, se desespera por imputar a la RPDC la responsabilidad de la agravacion de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana hablando ruidosamente de la supuesta "provocacion" y "amenaza" de aquella.
					
					Pero con tales disparates EE.UU. no convencera a nadie ni  ocultara su naturaleza agresiva.
					
					EE.UU. pretende tildar vanamente la RPDC de "provocadora".
					
					Para el imperio yanqui el unico remedio es abandonar la anacronica politica hostil anti-RPDC reflexionandose con serenidad del proceso historico de la confrontacion con ella caracterizado por su derrota.
					
					La confrontacion militar con la RPDC, potencia militar del Juche con alta dignidad y poderoso pais poseedor de armas nucleares inclusiva hasta la bomba H, es igual a un acto de suicidio que lleva por si mismo el futuro de EE.UU. a la ruina.

articles.title: No seran tolerados mas simulacros nucleares de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea, insiste Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No seran tolerados mas simulacros nucleares de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea, insiste Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 9 de abril (ACNC) -- En el Sur de Corea se sigue todavia el ejercicio belico conjunto Foal Eagle 16, aunque termino el simulacro Key Resolve en que se movilizaron todos los armamentos mortiferos nucleares y los efectivos de operacion especial de EE.UU. 
					Los imperialistas norteamericanos y los titeres surcoreanos toman abiertamente como blanco del Foal Eagle 16 la Direccion Suprema de la potencia Paektusan. 
					
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un comentario individual de este sabado, lo califica del mas abierto desafio a la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y la abierta declaracion de guerra contra ella, y continua:
					
					Ahora, llegan al cielo la colera y el sentimiento de venganza del ejercito y pueblo coreanos contra los imperialistas norteamericanos y la horda traidora surcoreana de Park Geun-hye. 
					
					Ya se acabo completamente con el monopolio de EE.UU. sobre el ataque preventivo nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					El destino del territorio estadounidense se decide por las fuerzas armadas coreanas. 
					
					Los militares y civiles coreanos no pueden tolerar nunca mas los ejercicios de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC de los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos. 
					
					El enemigo jurado yanqui y la horda traidora surcoreana de Park Geun-hye no deben despreciar la advertencia reiterada de la RPDC. 
					
					Si los provocadores desean mantener su existencia en este planeta, deben renunciar de inmediato la politica de enfrentamiento nuclear anti-RPDC.
